channel.title: How do i make INTS for model's i have made?
channel.description:
Hi currently i have been making my own model's and other thing's but how would i make the ints to put them into my server...Does anybody know a way?
Thanks for reading... [right][i]Mad_Moparscapian[/i][/right]

item.title: How do i make INTS for model's i have made?
item.dc:creator: @noobspure50 noobspure50
item.description:
@noobspure50 wrote:

if(i == 0000) // change this if you need to "item number" { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";//New option class8.anInt174 = 000; //Model ID class8.anInt181 = 2128;//Model Zoom class8.anInt190 = 591;//Model Rotation class8.anInt198 = 1034;//model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle class8.anInt204 = 138;//Unknown class8.anInt199 = -1;//noteable class8.anInt169 = 8;// model offset increase to move to the right class8.anInt194 = 11;//model offset increase to move up class8.anInt165 = 805;//male wearing class8.anInt200 = 805;//female wearing class8.anInt175 = -1;//Unknown class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable//Unknown class8.anInt164 = -1;//Female arms/sleeves class8.anInt188 = -1;//male arms/sleeves class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = "ITEM NAME HERE";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "EXAMINE INFO".getBytes();//examin info dont mess with getBytes() or it wont work }

change the 0s to model id and the Item id in game!

Read full topic
